import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const JobDetail = ()=> { const [jobDetail, setJobDetail] = useState(); const getJobByID = async(id)=> { const response = await axios.get(`new_post/${id}`) setJobDetail(response.data.data) } const {id} = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ getJobByID(id) }, []) return (

👋 {jobDetail ? jobDetail.title: "Title"}

{jobDetail ? jobDetail.description: "Description"}

Contents

    {jobDetail ? new Function("return " + jobDetail.steps+ ";")().map((step)=> (

  1. {step[0]}

    {step[1]}

    2. )): null}
) } export default JobDetail;
